techmeme.title: Google updates its Street View imagery in nearly 80 countries, brings Street View to new locations, and sharpens satellite imagery across Google Earth and Maps (Emma Roth/The Verge)

Stability AI says filmmaker James Cameron has joined its board of directors (Alex Weprin/The Hollywood Reporter)
